Ice Hockey Manager
==================

The IHM is NOT FINISHED !

This release just gives you an overview of the features that have already been implemented.

See the changelog for further informations.


Requirements:
-------------

- JRE or JDK 1.5 or higher. (http://java.sun.com)


Installation:
-------------

- Extract the "ihm-<version>.tar.gz" archive into a new directory (Example: "$HOME\ihm").


Start:
------

To start the IHM, start the "ihm" or "ihm.bat" script in the ihm directory.


Further informations:
---------------------

Visit the homepage at: http://www.icehockeymanager.org
